sqlMap.select: /* ViewColMstrDAO.selectList */ SELECT DS_VIEW_ID ,TBL_NM ,COL_NM ,COL_CAPTION ,DATA_TYPE ,LENGTH ,PK_YN ,COL_DESC ,COL_EXPRESS ,ALLOW_NULL ,COL_ID ,REG_USER_NO ,REG_DT ,UPD_USER_NO ,UPD_DT ,POPUP FROM WP2_VIEW_COL_MSTR WHERE DS_VIEW_ID = #DS_VIEW_ID# AND TBL_NM = #TBL_NM# ORDER BY COL_ID
